decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following drawings / document title number(s): LOCATION PLAN; ECDL/E/P/0488/1 (07-12-2022, PROPOSED FLOOR PLANS); ECDL/E/P/0488/2 (07-12-2022, PROPOSED REAR ELEVATION); ECDL/E/P/0488/3 (07-12-2022, PROPOSED SIDE ELEVATIONS); ECDL/E/P/0488/4 (07-12-2022, PROPOSED FRONT ELEVATION).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the host property and local area, in accordance with Policies D3, D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and Policies 7.4, 7B and 7C of Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013).
| No part of the flat roof of the hereby approved development shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with Policies 7A and 7B of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013). | The hereby approved rooflights to the side roofslopes and to the rear extension shall be conservation style and lie flush with the roof and retained as such for the lifetime of the development.

Reason: To minimise light spillage and interference with the privacy and outlook of adjoining occupiers and in the interests of good neighbourliness and in accordance with policies D4 and HC1 of the London Plan (2021) and 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013). | Notwithstanding the provisions of Article 3 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (or any subsequent amendment, revision or new Order) no windows or other openings (other than those shown on the submitted plans) shall be formed in the walls or roof of the building permitted.

Reason:  To protect residential amenity, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 and 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D1 and D4 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2021).
description: Front porch extension; single storey, part two storey rear extension; dormer roof extension to the main rear roof; installation of rooflights.
